CustomField.formula:
( EPLI_Limit_Adjusted_Rate__c * (
IF ( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Retention_Modifier_Retention__c , "$10,000"), 1.400, IF ( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Retention_Modifier_Retention__c , "$15,000"), 1.325, IF ( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Retention_Modifier_Retention__c , "$20,000"), 1.200, IF ( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Retention_Modifier_Retention__c , "$25,000"), 1.150, IF ( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Retention_Modifier_Retention__c , "$35,000"), 1.050, IF ( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Retention_Modifier_Retention__c , "$50,000"), 1.000, IF ( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Retention_Modifier_Retention__c , "$75,000"), 0.975, IF ( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Retention_Modifier_Retention__c , "$100,000"), 0.950, IF ( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Retention_Modifier_Retention__c , "$150,000"), 0.925, IF ( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Retention_Modifier_Retention__c , "$200,000"), 0.905, IF ( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Retention_Modifier_Retention__c , "$250,000"), 0.900, IF ( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Retention_Modifier_Retention__c , "$500,000"), 0.875, 0 ))))))))))))) - EPLI_Limit_Adjusted_Rate__c)
CustomField.label: EPLI Retention Modifier (Adj)
